annotations:
Ashish / Kaan
Good day. I hope you are well.
Any update for below?
Best regards,
Kaan KARABULUT
Core Shipping
Bagdat Cad, Turab Sok, No:06/03
34744, Istanbul
+90 (507) 387 65 13 (Mobile)
+90 (216) 392 20 10 (Office)
From: Kaan Karabulut | Core Shipping <kaan@core-shipping.com>
Date: Tuesday, 13 August 2024 at 18:28
To: Projects- Trinity <projects@trinity-ship.com>
Cc: Projects- Trinity <projects@trinity-ship.com>, Ravindraa- Trinity Ship <Ravindraa@trinity-ship.com>, Chartering - Core Shipping <chartering@core-shipping.com>
Subject: Re: 724.8 CBM USED DUMP TRUCKS - IZMIR TO LAGOS - READY CARGO
Ashish / Kaan
Good day.
Thank you for the cargo proposal. We may try this cargo firm sub freight level.
We can offer asf:
++
Vessel: M/V Anubis
Account: Please advise
Cargo: 3 x Dump trucks L: 10,6 m x W: 4,85 m x H: 4,7 m // Weight: 50000 KGS each
Under/on deck
Cargo not stackable
P/c basis
Lay/can: 20/30 August 2024
POL: Izmir, Owners terminal
POD: Lagos, Owners terminal
Freight: USD 225,000 lump sum
Terms: FLT HH
Dem/Det: USD 8500 pd/pr
Loading: As fast as vessel can load
Discharging: As fast as vessel can load
Congestion, if any, to count as detention both ends
Owners agents at load port: Reba Shipping
Owners agents at discharge port: TBA
2,5% commissions
Clean Gencon 94 to apply
NMA/NPA/Nimasa to be for charterers/receivers account
Armed guard / security expenses to be for owners account
Sub all further terms / details / indication is bss current tariffs for load/disch costs and d/a
End offer
Best regards,
Kaan KARABULUT
Core Shipping
Bagdat Cad, Turab Sok, No:06/03
34744, Istanbul
+90 (507) 387 65 13 (Mobile)
+90 (216) 392 20 10 (Office)
From: Projects- Trinity <projects@trinity-ship.com>
Date: Tuesday, 13 August 2024 at 18:12
To:
Cc: Projects- Trinity <projects@trinity-ship.com>, Ravindraa- Trinity Ship <Ravindraa@trinity-ship.com>
Subject: 724.8 CBM USED DUMP TRUCKS - IZMIR TO LAGOS - READY CARGO
Dear Sir / Ashish
Greetings of the Day !!
Please propose the firm rate for the cargo below.
+++++++++
POL: IZMIR, TURKEY (CAN TRY ANY CLOSEST PORT)
POD: LAGOS, NIGERIA  (CAN TRY ANY CLOSEST PORT)
CARGO: 3 X USED DUMP TRUCKS
DIMS: 10.6 M (L) X 4.85 M (W) X 4.7 M (H)
WT / UNIT: 50 MT
VOL / UNIT: 241.6 CBM
TTL VOL: 724.8 CBM
TTL WT: 150 MT
TTL FRT: 725 RT
LAYCAN: READY
TERMS: FLT H/H
2.5% TTL
REMARKS:
- UNDER DECK / PART CARGO / NON-STACKABLE
+++++++++
Plsd to rcv yr feedback
Best Regards,
Ashish Bachchan
Trinity Ship Brokers Ltd
MOB:  +91 9096016301
E: projects@trinity-ship.com
